creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: image illustrating "Crooked Man" nursery rhyme; thin, stooped man wearing a tall black wooly cap and knickers, walking with a crooked cane; cat catching a mouse in front of man on path; crooked house in background, ULC, with twisting chimney; restrike, numbered 5/6
inscription:
Inscription

below image, in pencil: [5/6 RESTRIKE - RICHARD HOLZSCHUH]; on back, in pencil: [RH-10081]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Crooked Man
